column4: Can anyone familiar with linux administration answer these questions?   http://pastebin.com/bDx2zTy8
you won't need to "disable wine", its not a default app. Just don't install it. If you keep your users as users and not in the admin group most of this be managed for you
C compiling is available, you will just need to install the compiler
you will need a proxy server to filter sites as well as log access
